about_the_game:
What kind of work is this?
This work is a storyline rpg game where each NPC can communicate (it is best to save before communication, as different choices will affect different endings).
The work tells the story of a newly graduated graduate's career adventure.
You will play the role of the protagonist in various e-commerce problems encountered in the e-commerce company, and you will manipulate the protagonist to help solve various e-commerce troubles and achieve various outcomes.
The game contains various strange endings. Please save more when playing this game!
If you want to achieve the true outcome, please work hard. QAQ(I work in the game.0.o).

How to save money by playing with works?
The standard selling price of the game is 1.99 $, which will be lowered to the lowest level during discounts. If you want to save money, you can purchase after the discount
All revenue from this game will be invested in UP's entrepreneurial new work, please stay tuned.

This story is purely fictional, and if there are any similarities, it is purely coincidental!
If Xiaoyan's personal work, thank you for playing this game!

name: 上班啦

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: windows7/8/10/11
  • Processor: all
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: all
  • Sound Card: all
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: This work is a storyline game. You will play the newly hired protagonist in an e-commerce company, talking to various NPCs, selecting appropriate options, assisting in solving various e-commerce troubles, and achieving various game endings.
